Demo - Visualization

@getpostman

Request

API Requests

Using Postman, you can make requests to an API, defining the details of each request, then sending when complete.

Response

API Response

You can view the response, seeing the body, cookies, headers, and other details of the request being made.

Script

Visualization Scripts

Using the Postman test scripts you can write JavaScript that can render a visualization derived from each response.

Define

Visualization CSS

Define the CSS that will shape the visualization, providing the presentation layer to be applied to each response.

Define

Visualization HTML

Define the HTML that will shape the visualization, providing the presentation layer to be applied to each response.

Bar Chart Visualization

View data as a bar chart visualization.

View HTML Listing

View data as a HTML listing visualization.

Tag Cloud Visualization

View data as a tag cloud visualization.

Heat Map Visualization

View data as a heat map visualization.

Any Visualization

Or define any visualization you'd like to see from response.
